price: (156) And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaẓīmin
